      public <V> V getLabel(Class<V> targetClass)
      Gets the label configured on this builder if it is of the target type specified. If no label is set or the label is not of the specified type, null will be returned.
      Type Parameters:
      V - target type the label should match
      Parameters:
      targetClass - target type the label should match
      Returns:
      label instance or null

    • detectFieldErrors

      public FormGroupElementBuilder detectFieldErrors(boolean detectFieldErrors)
      Should field errors for the control present in this form group be detected automatically. If this is the case (default) a Errors object will be searched for on the model and the control name will be used as the selector for possible errors.
      Parameters:
      detectFieldErrors - should an Errors model object be used
      Returns:
      current builder

    • fieldErrorsToShow

      public FormGroupElementBuilder fieldErrorsToShow(String... fieldNames)
      Display the field errors for the given names as validation feedback. This will inspect the attached Errors object.
      Parameters:
      fieldNames - to show the errors for
      Returns:
      current builder
